sentence.Network_en: High big big horn comes home of the flatfish that stew.
sentence.Network_cn: 高高大大的喇叭回家炖比目鱼的啦.

sentence.Network_en: A large edible marine flatfish ( Pleuronectes platessa ) of western European waters.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧鲽一种生长在西欧水域中的可食的海生大比目鱼 ( 鲽鲽科 )

sentence.Network_en: A dextral flatfish lies with the right eye uppermost.
sentence.Network_cn: 右侧比目鱼躺着时右边的眼睛朝上.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 比目鱼比目鱼（flatfish）---“变色龙”，是两只眼睛长在一边的奇鱼，被认为需两鱼并肩而行，故名比目鱼。它是海水鱼中的一大类，包 …
新西兰鲽鱼（FLATFISH），整条，300克以下，300-500克，500-700克，700-1000克。包括7个品种：新西兰鲽，柠檬鲽，沙鲽，黄 …
富隆酒膳 ... 牡丹虾 Botan Shrimp 左口鱼 Flatfish 日本北海道深海北极贝 Hokkaido Scallop.
比目鱼在英文里被叫做“扁平鱼”（flatfish），这指的是它的身体形状。不过，正如中文名称所表明的，比目鱼最奇特的特征是它的眼睛。

list.abs: a large brownish European flatfish ., 大型褐色欧洲比目鱼.
sinistral flatfish lies with the left eye uppermost ., 左侧比目鱼躺着时左边的眼睛在最上面.
sinistral flatfish lies with the left eye uppermost ., 左侧比目鱼躺着时左边的眼睛在最上面.
...它的口特大,颚骨牙齿大而明显,所以又称为,大口鲽,此外,它的背鳍,臀鳍前都有鳍棘,所以也称为,棘鲽鱼,spiny flatfish,至于背鳍起点较前,在头部或眼睛上方的则是鲽亚目和鳎亚目,两者的背鳍,臀鳍皆无硬棘,颚骨也没有牙齿.

entry.tran: 比目鱼(扁平的海鱼，如鲽)
entry.def: Flatfish are sea fish with flat wide bodies, for example plaice or sole.

means.word_mean: 1. sweet lean whitish flesh of any of numerous thin-bodied fish; usually served as thin fillets
2. any of several families of fishes having flattened bodies that swim along the sea floor on one side of the body with both eyes on the upper side

auth_sentence.content: Dab, which is a flatfish and good alternative to plaice.
